channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Guardium Insights
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Guardium Insights

item.title: CVE-2020-4174|2024-08-04T08:00:07.354Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 174683.

item.title: CVE-2020-4167|2024-08-04T08:00:07.043Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information or perform unauthorized actions due to improper authenciation mechanisms. IBM X-Force ID: 174403.

item.title: CVE-2020-4165|2024-08-04T08:00:07.333Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 174401.

item.title: CVE-2020-4169|2024-08-04T08:00:07.323Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 174405.

item.title: CVE-2020-4171|2024-08-04T08:00:07.330Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174407.

item.title: CVE-2020-4172|2024-08-04T08:00:07.325Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 174408.

item.title: CVE-2020-4166|2024-08-04T08:00:07.041Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174402.

item.title: CVE-2020-4175|2024-08-04T08:00:07.031Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 174684.

item.title: CVE-2020-4170|2024-08-04T08:00:07.064Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20insights
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Insights 2.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 174406.
